    BasePoller is a class polling devices using a selector.

    CamKeyboardPoller is an interface for camera keyboards.
    ChecksumException
    Thrown whenever there is a checksum error on received data.
    CommMessage<T extends ControllerProperty>
    A comm message encapsulates properties which can be queried from or stored in a controller.
    CommMessageImpl<T extends ControllerProperty>
    Comm message implementation.
    CommSelector
    A comm selector performs non-blocking I/O on a set of channels.
    CommThread<T extends ControllerProperty>
    CommThread represents a communication channel with priority-queued polling.
    ControllerException
    ControllerException
    ControllerProp
    A controller property can be queried from or stored to a controller.
    ControllerProperty
    A controller property is one element of a CommMessage.
    CRC
    A generic cyclic redundancy check (CRC) calculator.
    DatagramMessenger
    A DatagramMessenger is a class which can poll a field controller and get the response using a UDP socket connection.
    DeviceContentionException
    A device contention exception happens when one operation has a lock on a device while another tries to acquire the lock.
    DevicePoller
    Device poller interface.
    DevicePollerFactory
    A factory for creating device poller objects.
    DisconnectException
    DisconnectException is thrown when a comm link or modem is disconnected.

    DMSPoller is an interface for pollers which can send messages to DMS sign devices.
    DownloadRequestException
    Exception thrown when a controller requests a download
    FeedPoller
    FeedPoller is a poller for controllers with no devices.
    FlowStreamPoller
    FlowStreamPoller is an interface for pollers which can configure flow streams.
    FutureOp
    Schedule a DeviceOp to be run sometime in the future.
    GateArmPoller
    GateArmPoller is an interface for pollers which can send messages to gate arm devices.
    GpsPoller
    GpsPoller is an interface for pollers which can talk to GPS units.
    HttpFileMessenger
    A HttpFileMessenger is a class which reads a file from a URL using HTTP or HTTPS.
    InputDetector
    InputDetector InputStream wrapper used by BasicMessenger to detect when data is received.
    InvalidAddressException
    InvalidAddressException is thrown when a controller address is invalid.
    InvalidReqException
    InvalidReqException is thrown when an invalid request is made.
    LaneMarkingPoller
    LaneMarkingPoller is an interface for pollers which can send messages to lane marking devices.
    LCSPoller
    LCSPoller is an interface for pollers which can send messages to LCS arrays.
    Messenger
    A Messenger is a class which can poll a field controller and get the response.
    MessengerException
    MessengerException is thrown when a Messenger cannot be created.
    MeterPoller
    MeterPoller is an interface for pollers which can send messages to ramp meter devices.
    ModemException
    ModemException is thrown when a modem setup error happens.
    ModemMessenger
    A Modem Messenger provides modem dialup support on top of another messenger (such as StreamMessenger).
    NoModemException
    A NoModemException is thrown when no modem is available.
    NoResponseException
    Exception for disconnecting after timeout.
    NotReceivedException
    Exception thrown when data is not received by an operation
    OpController<T extends ControllerProperty>
    An operation is a sequence of phases to be performed on a field controller.
    OpDevice<T extends ControllerProperty>
    An operation on a traffic device, such as a ramp meter or DMS.
    Operation
    An operation is a sequence of steps to be performed on a field controller.
    OpHandler<T extends ControllerProperty>
    An interface to handle operations in the poll queue.
    OpQueue<T extends ControllerProperty>
    A prioritized queue which sorts Operation objects by their priority class.
    OpStep
    A step is one part of an operation to communicate with a field controller.
    OutputDetector
    OutputDetector OutputStream wrapper used by BasicMessenger to detect when data is sent.
    PacketMessenger
    A PacketMessenger is a class which can poll a field controller and get the response using a UDP socket connection.
    ParsingException
    This exception gets thrown on errors when parsing received data.
    PriorityLevel
    Priority level for communication operations.
    PromptReader
    Simple text line reader modified to (in addition to parsing normal EOL (CR/LF) terminated lines) also look for a specific expected response with no EOL.
    ProtocolException
    ProtocolException is thrown when a protocol is not followed
    ReconnectException
    ReconnectException is thrown when a messenger needs to be reconnected.
    SamplePoller
    SamplePoller is an interface for pollers which can send messages to traffic data sampling devices (detectors).
    SelectorThread
    The selector thread performs non-blocking I/O on a set of channels.
    SshMessenger
    SshMessenger is a class used to interface between the IRIS Messenger subsystem and the JSch SSH communication jar.
    StreamMessenger
    A StreamMessenger is a class which can poll a field controller and get the response using a TCP socket connection.
    TagReaderPoller
    TagReaderPoller is an interface for pollers which can communicate with tag readers.
    TestFileMessenger
    A TestFileMessenger is a class which reads a file from the filesystem.
    ThreadedPoller<T extends ControllerProperty>
    ThreadedPoller is a class polling devices using a CommThread.
    TransientPoller<T extends ControllerProperty>
    TransientPoller is a ThreadedPoller which causes equal operations to be replaced instead of rejected.
    VideoMonitorPoller
    VideoMonitorPoller is an interface for pollers which can send video monitor switching messages.
    WeatherPoller
    WeatherPoller is an interface for polling weather data sensors for precipitation, visibility, wind speed, etc.
